Where Earth and Heaven Meets

To put it simply, before you can create a warrior, you must first create a universe.
Yet another image from “Wszechświat życie człowiek” (Universe, Life, Human) and this one is actually in Bryson's book[1] (the paper version).

Quote by Friedrich Nietzsche

You must have chaos within you to give birth to a dancing star.

Friedrich Nietzsche[2]
